Title: Relates to a moratorium on new licensed home care service agency approvals
Summary: Relates to a moratorium on new licensed home care service agency approvals.
LawCode: Amd §§4403-f, 3605 & 3605-b, Pub Health L; amd Part B §9-e, Chap 57 of 2018
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to a moratorium on new licensed home care service agency approvals; and to amend part B of chapter 57 of the laws of 2018 amending the public health law and other laws relating to limitations on licensed home care service agency contracts and registration of licensed home care services agencies, in relation to the moratorium on the processing and approval of applications seeking licensure of a licensed home care services agency
